entry.title: Octopress Is an Awfully Fun Blogging Engine
entry.content:
This is my first time writing a blog using markdown, and Octopress makes this pretty great.

I like it, because it has the feel of writing and compiling code to it, but the product is a blog post.

For instance, after I finish writing the markdown from the screenshot above, Iâ€™ll simply run,

rake generate


rake deploy

and - wallah! - new blog post!

I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship :)
